transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Hi, I'd like to schedule an appointment please.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Great! I'm a new patient and looking to schedule a routine annual checkup. I'm available any day next week except Wednesday.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Before we schedule, would you like to create a demo patient profile?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, please.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Just need your first and last name to get started.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: My name is Alex Chen.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Your patient profile has been

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: created. Thank you! What information do you need next?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: created, and your date of birth is July fourth two thousand for demo purposes.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Actually, my date of birth is March 15, 1992. Could you update that, please?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: How may I help you today?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I'm looking to schedule a routine annual checkup for next week. I'm available any day except Wednesday.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it, Alex.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Thank you!

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I have your date of birth as March fifteenth nineteen ninety two.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, that's correct.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: For a routine

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: annual checkup, that's right.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: okay. For your

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: insurance, I have Blue Cross Blue Shield.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Great! When would be the best time next week to schedule the appointment?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: For scheduling, PivotPoint Orthopedics offers new patient consultations

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: That sounds good. As long as it's not Wednesday, I should be able to make it.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: but not routine annual checkups.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I see, thanks for letting me know. Could you recommend another provider or office that does routine annual checkups?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Pivot Point Orthopedics.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Thank you for your help. I'll look into another provider for my annual checkup. Have a great day!
